title: [1.12.2][Lost Magic ——失落魔法]爷爷你关注的模组更新了
author: 蝙蝠森林
txt_content:
本帖最后由 蝙蝠森林 于 2020-11-29 11:34 编辑 


 Lost Magic是以魔法为主题的Minecraft Mod。

这个名字你们听着可能很陌生但我告诉你们


它1.7.10版本，名叫禁忌魔法(伪经) ，到了18.9版本，名叫魔法学院 ，几经迭代终于迎来了1.12.2的时代。
Lost Magic（失落魔法）他继承禁忌魔法原来的形式并移植到1.12.2，但是更新速度缓慢，目前只制作了2个没什么用的工具

Mod介绍
A small add-on I made for Thaumcraft in 1.12 because there were items from Forbidden Magic that I missed, but didn't want to stick to the Dark 'n Edgy theme.
Features- Ring of Nutrition: Throw off the tyranny of food!- Shovel of the Purifier: Break those nasty purple taint blocks when they show up on your property- Bloody Scrivener's Tools: Use LP instead of having to refill them with ink. (Only if Blood Magic is installed)

图片欣赏
魔导手册图
标签页图

更新记录
Initial Apocrypha research can now be completed

下载地址https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/lost-magic
